entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -34.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
